oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Carte de Vistie of Lt. Benjamin B. Ferguson, Co. F, 13th Tenn. Cav. Regt., USA
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Lt. Benjamin Ferguson was from Stoney Creek in Carter County and joined Co. F, 13th Tenn. Cav. Regt., USA. Captured at Morrisontown, Tenn. on November 13, 1864, he lost his arm while in a Confederate prison camp in Richmond, Va.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Ferguson, Benjamin B.
